title: MD
biography: Jay Mehta is an Indian businessman. He is the son of Mahendra Mehta and Sunayana Mehta and grandson of Nanji Kalidas Mehta, who own the Mehta Group which is spread over Africa, India, Canada and United States. He is the cousin of late Kenyan race car driver, Shekhar Mehta. He is married to actress Juhi Chawla.
aiSummary: V. S. Mehta is a neurosurgery specialist with an H-index of 78 at Paras Hospitals (Member). Has been published in Nature Genetics, Nature Communications, Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
